lead_paragraph: The request was an indication that an escalating dispute between the Moroccan authorities and Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon over the disputed territory is not abating.

headline.print_headline: Morocco Asks That U.N. Close Western Sahara Military Office
headline.main: Morocco Asks That U.N. Close Western Sahara Military Office

snippet: The request was an indication that an escalating dispute between the Moroccan authorities and Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon over the disputed territory is not abating.
abstract: Morocco asks United Nations to close military office in Western Sahara, indication that dispute between Moroccan authorities and United Nations Sec Gen Ban Ki-moon concerning territory is not over.
